articles.content:

articles.title: Jean-Louis Trintignant, French cinema legend who starred in A Man and a Woman and Amour – obituary - The Telegraph
articles.description: He rose to fame during the French New Wave and despite personal tragedy established himself as one of France’s most gifted actors
articles.content:
